item.title: National Guard member dies after shooting in Washington DC
item.description: Sarah Beckstrom, 20, succumbed to her injuries, while a second guardsman remains in critical condition, said President Donald Trump on Thursday.

item.title: We met on TV's Blind Date - we're still married after 34 years
item.description: Sue and Alex Tatham became the first couple who met on Blind Date to get married. They reflect on a life together 40 years after the show first broadc...

item.title: 25 Oscar-tipped films, and how to watch them
item.description: Hamnet, Avatar and Marty Supreme will face one battle after another as the awards race heats up.

item.title: The Papers: 'U-turn on workers' rights' and 'big migration fall'
item.description: A government u-turn on day-one worker protections, leads the papers as does migration data and the Budget.

item.title: At 15 my best friend promised she'd have my baby. Now I'm a mum
item.description: Georgia and Daisy's childhood closeness later become the foundation for a life-changing act of generosity.
